See What Clients Say About Bodyful Toronto

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Feel confident in choosing Bodyful Toronto by reading some of our many client testimonials. Our staff and process help ensure you’re fully happy with your treatment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”75px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-xs”]

They said
”

Testimonials

I highly recommend BodyFul by Suzy. She is an excellent beauty consultant . She is very knowledgeable, patient, charming, respectful, professional and always available and open to questions online or during the appointment. I feel comfortable having all my beauty sessions (wood therapy, ice therapy and others ) at BodyFul . I would not trust anyone else with my body care. Best beauty expert I have ever met. Thank you Suzy!
Andrea Gazzaneo ● Client

Testimonials

I enjoyed my Wood Therapy & Lymphatic Drainge training with Suzy at Bodyful Toronto. She was an awesome and very understanding instructor. Suzy, went over and beyond for myself and another student present. She was very easy going and patient. Also, we were provided with various types of models to represent various women’s body shapes and types. Way to go Suzy, and keep up the great work. It was a pleasure!
Lisa Asumadu-Sakyi ● Client

Testimonials

The courses at BodyFul Toronto cover an incredible amount of ground in an amazingly short period of time. The classes are extremely informative and seamless. Each course topic builds upon from the previous one. Never leaving you confused by the tremendous amount of Information being taught. Suzy has an infectious enthusiasm for the love of this industry. She literally leaves no rock unturned when it comes to arming you for every single aspect of this business. Even when you’re all said and done, Suzy remains connected to make sure you always know you have her support!
Cristina Marchese-DeCiccio ● Client

Testimonials

Hands down Bodyful is the best in everything beauty and body. This has to be the best experience i've had with body contouring and reshaping in Toronto. They are extremley knowledgable and will answer all questions you have in regards to your body goals. I had a severe breakout and they were able to also point me into the right direction in regards to skin care, my routine and also services like microneedling. I had ice sculpting done and the first thing I noticed is that the spa is clean! I was comfortable and she talked me through the whole procedure, took before and after pictures. I also got to take a warm shower after I was done. I cant wait to go back!
Ameena Sadique ● Client
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm”][vc_column_text]
